name: Anorith

evolution.description: Anorith can evolve into Armaldo at level 10 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 8 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Old Shrimp Pokémon. Anorith was regenerated from a prehistoric fossil. This primitive Pokémon once lived in warm seas. It grips its prey firmly between its two large claws.

abilities.name: Battle Armor
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to extra damage dealt by a Critical Hit.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: This Pokémon's speed is doubled in rainy conditions.
